name: Easy Script Language
short_description:
ESL is a script programation langage which aim to be very usefull to use and at the same time very powerfull. 
ESL is an open-source project in developement. Fell free to contact me if you want to be a part of this project. We are open to everybody.
For now you only can test it on linux platform, but all stable release will be distributed with it windows release.
summary: An Easy and powerfull Script Language
